/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with power lines and street lamps, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly red and brown, rise up to meet the sky, which is a clear blue with a smattering of clouds. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
